name: Mr. Maze (itch)
description:
Mr. Maze is a CoCo 3 game requiring a joystick. It was inspired by those wooden labyrinth games where you guide a marble through a maze avoiding the little holes cut out of the surface. Mr. Maze has one maze built right in to the program, and  also allows you to load maze files created with the included editor program. 

This originally appeared in November and December 1993 issues of The World of '68 Micros.
